title: Alpine Nights
description: Alpine Nights is the second instalment in the Jessica's Seduction series of erotic romance novellas. On their new adventure together, Jessica and Preston further develop their romantic relationship when they travel to Europe in winter. There they perform photo shoots, ski in the Swiss Alps, spend time with friends in a romantic chalet in the snow, then embark on a treacherous journey through Germany's Black Forest in search of wolves. As with any new relationship lust is abundant, and the lead characters don't hold back when it comes to getting want they want sexually. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
